title: What should I study after an FA for the best future in Pakistan? - Quora

response.answer_text: if I have to suggest to you about the study after FA, HERE ARE SOME FIELDS YOU CAN CHOOSE FOR PERFECT future in Pakistan … LLB, BS in computer science or software engineering, BSc mathematics,b.a then m.a English or ma economics, MSC IT after BSc or BA CSS (Central Superior Service Exam) is the best option above prepare In two-three years for this exam and then you all set for the high rank in Pakistan if you are a hard worker.
Dear friend always try to get professional degree like Law. B. Com M. Com have also good scope. M. Ed too is good.
